subject: written recommendation of super.setUp/tearDown ?
msgSnippet: I have it in my head that the junit folks recommend always calling super.setUp/tearDown from a user declared setUp/tearDown, even if the JUnit test in question
messageBody:
I have it in my head that the junit folks recommend always calling
super.setUp/tearDown from a user declared setUp/tearDown, even if the JUnit
test in question is directly derived from TestCase. However i cannot find
any written (web page) recommendation to so. Is this still the case? Is
there a documented recommendation some where?

-thanks
dave
